mapper.select: SELECT `th_num` AS `thNum`, `th_name` AS `thName`, `th_addr` AS `thAddr`, `th_img` AS `thImg` FROM `jgv`.`theater` LEFT JOIN jgv.region reg ON theater.reg_num = reg.reg_num WHERE `reg_name` = #{region}

SELECT DISTINCT `theater`.`th_num` AS `thNum`, `th_name` AS `thName`, `th_addr` AS `thAddr`, `th_img` AS `thImg`, `th_parking` AS `thParking`, `reg_num` AS `regNum`, `cit_name` AS `citName`, `sc_start_date` AS `scStartDate`, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `jgv`.`cinema` LEFT JOIN jgv.theater t on t.th_num = cinema.th_num WHERE `th_name` = #{theater}) AS `cinemaCount`, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `jgv`.`seat` LEFT JOIN `jgv`.`cinema` ON `seat`.`ci_num` = cinema.`ci_num` LEFT JOIN `jgv`.`theater` ON theater.`th_num` = cinema.`th_num` WHERE `th_name` = #{theater}) AS `seatCount` FROM `jgv`.`theater` LEFT JOIN `jgv`.`cinema` `c` on `theater`.`th_num` = `c`.`th_num` LEFT JOIN `jgv`.`cinema_type` ON `c`.`cit_num` = `cinema_type`.`cit_num` LEFT JOIN `jgv`.`screen` ON `c`.`ci_num` = `screen`.`ci_num` WHERE `th_name` = #{theater} AND `sc_start_date` > NOW()

SELECT DISTINCT `screen`.`sc_num` AS `scNum`, `sc_start_date` AS `scStartDate`, `screen`.`mo_num` AS `moNum`, `screen`.`ci_num` AS `ciNum`, `mo_title` AS `moTitle`, `mo_date` AS `moDate`, `mo_time` AS `moTime`, `ge_name` AS `geName`, `cinema`.`cit_num` AS `citNum`, `ci_name` AS `ciName`, `cit_name` AS `citName`, `ra_grade` AS `raGrade`, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `jgv`.`seat` WHERE `seat`.`ci_num` = `cinema`.`ci_num`) AS `seatCount`, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `jgv`.`reservation` WHERE `reservation`.`sc_num` = `screen`.`sc_num`) AS `usedSeatCount` FROM `jgv`.`screen` LEFT JOIN `jgv`.`movie` ON `screen`.`mo_num` = `movie`.`mo_num` LEFT JOIN `jgv`.`movie_genere` ON `movie`.`mo_num` = `movie_genere`.`mo_num` LEFT JOIN `jgv`.`genre` ON `movie_genere`.`ge_num` = `genre`.`ge_num` LEFT JOIN `jgv`.`rating` ON `movie`.`ra_num` = `rating`.`ra_num` LEFT JOIN `jgv`.`cinema` ON `screen`.`ci_num` = `cinema`.`ci_num` LEFT JOIN `jgv`.`cinema_type` ON `cinema`.`cit_num` = `cinema_type`.`cit_num` LEFT JOIN `jgv`.`seat` ON `cinema`.`ci_num` = `seat`.`ci_num` LEFT JOIN `jgv`.`reservation` ON `screen`.`sc_num` = `reservation`.`sc_num` LEFT JOIN `jgv`.`theater` ON `cinema`.`th_num` = `theater`.`th_num` WHERE `sc_start_date` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{date}, '%') AND `sc_start_date` > NOW() AND `th_name` = #{theater} ORDER BY `ci_name`
